metadata.name: TOYO marbling technology #2
metadata.description: Japan's only integrated system from direct import of raw reptile leather to tanning, dyeing, and finishing. We have staff specializing in Cytes (export licenses issued by exporting countries) to comply with import regulations. We are confident in our dyeing and finishing techniques for reptile leather. There are six reptile leather tanneries in Japan. The company is the only one among them that handles the entire process of direct import of raw hides, tanning, dyeing, and finishing. Raw hides vary in quality from the import stage. The company has staff members specializing in sitess (export licenses issued by exporting countries) and complies with import regulations of the Washington Convention. The company has a system in place to directly import the most suitable reptile skins for its products. The company's dyeing and finishing techniques are highly regarded both domestically and internationally. The company's strength lies in its ability to respond quickly to any order, not to mention its meticulous finishing.
